MajorClaims.MC1: These changes make cooking so easy-to-use and time-saving as to improve the way we live to a great extent
MajorClaims.MC2: I would assert that this change has improved our life significantly

Claims.C1: the time-saving, simple food preparation process gives us more time to do other activities, more chance to select diverse kinds of foods and more willingness to cook meals
Claims.C2: people have more chance to do other activities they like since food preparation is no longer time-consuming
Claims.C3: since food preparation has become easier and more convenient, it is certainly great to preserve diverse kinds of foods at home
Claims.C4: This transformation may bring positive impacts to family in some cases

Premises.P1: such a change has liberated many housewives from tedious cooking process and gave them additional time to do something more meaningful like accompanying family or doing a job
Premises.P2: more people can sleep a bit later to go to work
Premises.P3: they only need a couple of time to prepare for the breakfasts
Premises.P4: People can have a variety of dishes even in a small meal and choose whatever they like
Premises.P5: More men, on the other hand, are willing to participate in cooking that they had never done before
